text: The 2019–20 Iranian Futsal Super League is the 21st season of the Iran Pro League and the 16th under the name Futsal Super League. Mes Sungun are the defending champions.Mes Sungun reclaim Iran futsal league title The season will feature 12 teams from the 2018–19 Super League and two new teams promoted from the 2018–19 1st Division: Shahin Kermanshah and Hyper Shahr Shahin Shahr. == Teams == === Stadia, locations and Personnel === {| class="wikitable sortable" !Team !City !Venue !Capacity !Head coach !Team captain !Past
